articles.title: What Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson told Ben Chilwell after Chelsea Champions League win - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: The Liverpool captain was filmed greeting the Chelsea defender as he arrived for England duty ahead of this summer's European Championships
articles.content:
Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson congratulated one of his England team mates on their Champions League triumph with Chelsea as the pair were reunited ahead of Euro 2020.
